column4: Hi there! I have a prob with the loglevel of pam (At least I think it's due to pam). I'm using edubuntu with ltsp and want to log both the login times and the logout times of remotely connected users. Sadly only the login times are logged. I tried changing the loglevel of ssh_config, but it doesn't work. Logout times of locally logged in users are logged, but not those of remote users. What can I do to fix this?
